IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TROCAIRE IS THE COLLEGE WHERE LIVES ARE TRANSFORMED. OUR STUDENTS WILL BE GRADUATES OF CHOICE IN CAREER-ORIENTED PROFESSIONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TROCAIRE COLLEGE, A PRIVATE, CAREER-ORIENTED CATHOLIC COLLEGE, IN THE SPIRIT OF THE SISTERS OF MERCY, STRIVES TO EMPOWER STUDENTS TOWARD PERSONAL ENRICHMENT, DIGNITY AND SELF-WORTH THROUGH EDUCATION IN A VARIETY OF PROFESSIONS AND IN THE LIBERAL ARTS. RECOGNIZING THE INDIVIDUAL NEEDS OF A DIVERSE STUDENT BODY, TROCAIRE COLLEGE PROVIDES LIFE LEARNING AND DEVELOPMENT WITHIN A COMMUNITY-BASED ENVIRONMENT. TROCAIRE COLLEGE PREPARES STUDENTS FOR SERVICE IN THE UNIVERSAL COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: INSTRUCTION - A 4-YEAR, PRIMARILY ASSOCIATE'S DEGREE-GRANTING PRIVATE NOT-FOR-PROFIT COLLEGE, OFFERING PRE-BACCALAUREATE CERTIFICATES, ASSOCIATE'S DEGREES AND BACHELOR'S DEGREES, REACHING APPROXIMATELY 1,000 FULL-AND PART-TIME CREDIT STUDENTS, WITH THREE ACADEMIC SEMESTERS (FALL, SPRING, SUMMER) AND OFFERING COURSES DURING THE DAY, IN THE EVENING, ON WEEKENDS AND VIA DISTANCE EDUCATION, AS WELL AS PROVIDING NON-CREDIT LIFELONG LEARNING AND CONTINUING EDUCATION

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ACADEMIC SUPPORT INCLUDES SERVICES TO STUDENTS IN THE FOLLOWING AREAS: LIBRARY, LEARNING CENTER, STUDENT GOVERNMENT, ADMISSIONS, FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE, STUDENT RECORDS, ADVISEMENT, BILLING, CAREER COUNSELING, AND HEALTH RECORDS

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: DEAN OF ALLIED HEALTH AND NURSING
VP OF ENROLLMENT AND STUDENT AFFAIRS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE RESTRICTED PRIMARILY FOR STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS AND AWARDS.

THE COLLEGE PUBLISHES ITS NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IN THE COLLEGE CATALOG, AN IMPORTANT PART OF THEIR PROMOTIONAL LITERATURE. A SHORTENED VERSION APPEARS IN OTHER PUBLICATIONS SUCH AS BROCHURES, ADVERTISEMENTS, AND COURSE SCHEDULES.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS, TUITION DISCOUNTS, AND STUDENT AID FOR STUDENTS ATTENDING TROCAIRE COLLEGE.
GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: EDUCATIONAL SUPPLIES SUCH AS TEXTBOOKS, NOTEBOOKS, WRITING MATERIALS, PROGRAM SPECIFIC SUPPLIES, AND OTHER VARIOUS EDUCATIONAL RELATED SUPPLIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ONCE TROCAIRE COLLEGE AWARDS SCHOLARSHIPS, DISCOUNTS, AND/OR STUDENT AID, AND THE STUDENT ACCEPTS THOSE FUNDS, THE COLLEGE DIRECTLY CREDITS THE STUDENTS TUITION BILL.
THE COLLEGE PAYS THE MEMBERSHIP DUES FOR THE PRESIDENT AT A LOCAL SOCIAL CLUB AS THE SOCIAL CLUB IS USED TO HAVE MEETINGS OF THE BOARD AS WELL AS MEETINGS WITH POTENTIAL SUPPORTERS OF THE COLLEGE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO THE MEMBERS OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW. AFTER REVIEW, THE COMMITTEE PUTS FORTH A RECOMMENDATION TO THE FULL BOARD AT ITS NEXT MEETING TO APPROVE THE 990 AND AUTHORIZES THE VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE TO SIGN THE DOCUMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD OF TRUSTEES ANNUALLY REVIEWS AND COMPLETES THE "CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT". KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REPORT ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICTS TO THEIR SUPERVISORS BY COMPLETING THE "CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE FORM". NO ANNUAL MONITORING OF KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION FOR CEO/TOP MANAGEMENT IS REVIEWED AND SET BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES HAS A WRITTEN CONTRACT WITH THE PRESIDENT OF THE COLLEGE, AND IN ESTABLISHING A SALARY, THERE IS AN ASSESSMENT OF COMPARABLE PRESIDENT SALARIES. COMPENSATION FOR OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES IS BASED ON POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES AND OTHER COMPARABLE EXISTING EMPLOYEES SALARY LEVELS. FACULTY SALARY DECISIONS ARE GUIDED BY THE COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PUBLIC CAN CONTACT THE PRESIDENT'S OFFICE DIRECTLY AND REQUEST TO SEE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND/OR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE REQUIRED DOCUMENTATION IS HELD AT THE MAIN CAMPUS WHICH IS THE SAME AS THE RETURNS ADDRESS.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
